name: Rodelbahn Tristenbachalm
description:
Lenght: 2.5 km 
Altitude at start: 1200m
Altitude at destination: 1000m 
Altitude difference 200, 
Difficulty level: moderate 
Opening times: Tuesday to Sunday until 10.00 p.m. ; closing day on Mondays 
Lighting: Yes 
Sled hire: at the Tristenbachalm, lending fee: € 3.-; only by aappointmen;
Cost of using the sled run: free of charge 
Available refreshment points: at the start of the sled run on the Tristenbachalm 
Special features: pleasant stop on the mountain pasture with music 
Accessibility´: 
    How to find: Parking available at the Naturparkhaus (nature park house) 
    Ascent: on foot or with the Rodeltaxi, time of walk: 40 min 
    Help with your ascent: For furter information on the Rodeltaxi, contact Christian Klausner (+43 5286 20032)
